title: Little spaces...fresh mint geo
content: I'm constantly inspired by all the amazing room decors I come across while trawling pinterest and blogs, and in particular, beautifully styled children's rooms, and obviously the creative parents and folks behind those well thought out little spaces. Here's a current favourite; fresh mint and bright white with midnight blue, mixed with touches of geometric prints and polka dots. 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5  x x x
